description: Tarvent is an email marketing, automation, and email API platform that allows to you to send campaigns, manage contacts, automate your marketing, and more.

actions.name: tarvent_create_audience_group
actions.description: Creates an audience group in the selected audience.

actions.name: tarvent_create_contact_note
actions.description: Adds a note to a contact.

actions.name: tarvent_create_contact
actions.description: This action is used to create or update a contact in an audience.

actions.name: tarvent_create_suppression_filter
actions.description: Creates a suppression filter in your account to suppress a contact.

actions.name: tarvent_create_transaction
actions.description: Sends a transactional email. NOTE: This will use your email API credits.

actions.name: tarvent_generate_custom_event
actions.description: Generate a custom event in your Tarvent account.

actions.name: tarvent_get_audience_groups
actions.description: Finds an audience group by name.

actions.name: tarvent_get_audiences
actions.description: Finds an audience by name or tags.

actions.name: tarvent_get_campaigns
actions.description: Finds a campaign by name, status or tags.

actions.name: tarvent_get_contact
actions.description: Finds a contact by your custom key data field (typically this is by email).

actions.name: tarvent_get_custom_event
actions.description: Finds a custom event by name.

actions.name: tarvent_get_journey
actions.description: Finds a journey by name, status or tags.

actions.name: tarvent_send_campaign
actions.description: Sends a copy of a campaign.

actions.name: tarvent_update_contact_group
actions.description: Adds or removes a contact from an audience group.

actions.name: tarvent_update_contact_journey
actions.display_name: Add/Remove A Contact From A Journey
actions.description: Adds or removes the contact from a journey.

actions.name: tarvent_update_contact_status
actions.description: Subscribes or unsubscribe a contact in an audience.

actions.name: tarvent_update_contact_tag
actions.description: Adds or removes a tag from contact.

triggers.name: tarvent_campaign_send_finished
triggers.description: Triggers when a campaign has been sent to a contact. WARNING: This will fire for every contact the campaign is sent to, please be careful using this trigger.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_added
triggers.description: Triggers when a contact is added to the selected audience.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_bounced
triggers.description: Triggers when a campaign or transactional email bounces (is rejected) for a contact.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_clicked
triggers.description: Triggers when a link within a campaign or transactional email is clicked by a recipient.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_group_updated
triggers.display_name: Contact Added Or Removed From A Group
triggers.description: Triggers when a contact is added or removed from a group.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_note_added
triggers.description: Triggers when a note is added to a contact.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_opened
triggers.description: Triggers when a campaign or transactional email is opened by a recipient.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_tag_updated
triggers.description: Triggers when a tag is added or removed from a contact.

triggers.name: tarvent_contact_unsubscribed
triggers.description: Triggers when a contact unsubscribes from an audience.

triggers.name: tarvent_form_submitted
triggers.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact submits a sign up, profile update, or other form.

triggers.name: tarvent_page_performed
triggers.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact performs a Call-To-Action within a landing page.

triggers.name: tarvent_survey_submitted
triggers.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact submits a survey.

triggers.name: tarvent_transaction_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a transactional email is created for a known or unknown contact.

triggers.name: tarvent_transaction_sent
triggers.description: Triggers when a transactional email is processed and sent to one or more recipients.
